title: Booking Submit Request
description: Schema of an booking submit request.

checkout_date.description:
The user's check-out date in YYYY-MM-DD.
The check-out date of the traveler.

payment.description: Defines the selected payment method of the user.

payment_method.description: An object containing the credit card details for payment of the reservation.

rooms.description: An array of rooms to be booked.

checkin_date.description:
The user's check-in date in YYYY-MM-DD.
The check-in date of the traveler.

partner_reference.description:
Advertiser's unique hotel id.
Partner hotel id.

final_price_at_booking.description: An object containing the entire price to be paid at time of booking, including taxes and fees.\nThis will be used to validate the line items.

final_price_at_checkout.description: An object containing the entire price to be paid at time of stay, including taxes and fees.\nThis will be used to validate the line items. If the full price is paid at the time of booking,\nthis element must still be included, with an amount of 0 or 0.00.

reference_id.description:
trivago identifier for the booking session. Please consider that this id might not be unique and should not be
treated as a "confirmation" id. Identifier for the booking session
